scripts.realtime package¶

Submodules¶

Main script

@author: Marc Casalprim

Created on 28 abr. 2017

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.Jordi_session3 module¶

Created on 28 abr. 2017

Main script

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.SC_Est_errorRT module¶

Created on 17 May 2017

Real Time scripts of the error between the SC and Estimator.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.biasRT module¶

Created on 17 may 2017

RT plottin gof the estimated biases.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.covsRT module¶

Created on 28 May 2017

Real time scripts of the estimated biases and the diagonal values of the covariance matrix P In addition, a RT plot of the diagonal values of the P rotated by the qGyros2Starcam.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.detectorsRT module¶

Created on Jun 5, 2017

Real time scripts of the FIR detectors data. There are some timing issues when generating the plots. The data reading and processing is fast, the problem comes from the plots.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.processDataRT module¶

Created on 2 May 2017

Real Time plots of crossElevation,elevation and target and telescope RA,DEC

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.starcamRT module¶

Created on 16 may 2017

Real Time script scripts Starcamera solutions in the Gyroscopes reference frame, using three different rotation orders.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.realtime.starcamkalmanRT module¶

Created on 21 May 2017

Real Time scripts of the Starcamera solutions and Estimated attitudes in the Gyroscopes reference frame.

@author: Marc Casalprim
